183E4540.Line7.101CF8: Perform the ritual at each for the blood. I'll gather the rest of what we need and meet you back at Wraithstead.

3FBA9B7E.: and: :  You'll find druid ritual totems in the Harrowfields and Wraithstead.

6736F1BC.Line3.101CF8: Well, now we know where the werewolf problem came from. We may be able to reverse it, if I can count on your help.
